s: Other amazon/ebay brands may also be, IDK. Crimped connectors are not nearly as long lasting or safe as soldered connections IMO. The wires start fraying apart rather quickly with crimped connectors.. a good picture of what I mean can be found here.. https://www.arrmaforum.com/threads/...y...
